name: SARSCoronavirus2ORF1abRegionQualitativeAndQuantitative
title: SARS Coronavirus 2 ORF1ab Region, Qualitative and Quantitative
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to qualitative and quantitative detection of nucleic acids within the Open Reading Frame 1ab (ORF1ab) region of SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in various specimens.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes detection of nucleic acids within the Open Reading Frame 1ab (ORF1ab) region of SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in various specimens.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
